Tried with both WiFi and cellular and this problem did not reproduce. After turning airplane mode off (tried turning on/off Wifi as well), both peers remained idle without receiving anything for at least 30s.

Any further information (platform, iOS version, stream/unary call, etc.) that is helpful on debugging/reproducing this would be appreciated.

Hi Muxi,

This issue was reproducible on WiFi, never tried on other networks. The
phone (an iPhone7) was always on airplane mode. To reproduce it we would:

-Turn off the wifi.
-Start the request and receive the no connectivity error.
-Turn on the wifi again.

If I remember correctly, we were able of getting the same error on iOS
simulators. Then again, the error wouldn't occur depending on the timing of
the connectivity switching (perhaps a race condition?).

Thanks,
